explains: adj. 季度的，每季的；（盾，图记）纵横划成四（或更多）部分的
adv. 一季一次地，按季度；（纹章）在盾的四分之一部分（或对角两部分）上
wordGroup: quarterly report 季报，季度报告

sentences.en: Their quarterly meetings were anodyne affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们的季度会议是平淡乏味的事情。

sentences.en: A full listing of the companies will be published quarterly.
sentences.cn: 公司名录大全每季度出版一次。

sentences.en: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.cn: 客户们通常提前付费，或按月，或按季度，或按年。
